meanings.definition: Not formally charged with a crime.
meanings.sent1: The unindicted man was free to go.
meanings.sent2: She remained unindicted throughout the investigation.
meanings.sent3: The unindicted suspect accidentally walked into the police station looking for directions.
meanings.sent4: Her innocence shone like an unindicted star in the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The unindicted individual stood out in a sea of accusations.

meanings.sent1: The unindicted company continued its operations smoothly.
meanings.sent2: He was relieved to be unindicted in the case.
meanings.sent3: The unindicted employee jokingly bragged about being the only innocent one in the office.
meanings.sent4: The unindicted team member was like a hidden gem waiting to be discovered.
meanings.sent5: The unindicted group stood strong against false allegations.
